channel.title: Posts on Chandler Underwood
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Chandler Underwood

item.title: Imbalanced Product Review Sentiment Classification
item.description: Using NLP, resampling, and surpervised machine learning techniques, I create a model to effectively classify the minority negative sentiment contained in a product reviews dataset.

item.title: Running Data Dashboard
item.description: Using the running data I cleaned up in a previous post, I create a Tableau dashboard that allows for dynamic granularity changes from the year down to day level.

item.title: Using Unsupervised ML to 'Typicalize' Product Reviews
item.description: Using NLP and unsupervised machine learning techniques, I create a model that can select the most typical samples to represent a set of reviews containing a keyword.

item.title: Building a Product Reviews Webscraper
item.description: Using the Python Requests and Beautiful Soup libraries, I construct a webscraper that can farm product reviews off of Zappos.com.

item.title: Cleaning Up Years of Daily Running Data
item.description: In this project I use several techniques to clean up and fill-in my running data from college that spans 6 years.
